item.description:
Let's enjoy a pot luck dinner on the New Haven Green together. Bring a blanket or lawn chair, something small to share, whatever you want to drink and join us for an evening of camaraderie and music. If we end early we can do other things. We'll meet on the New Haven Green at 6:00PM. I'm not sure yet how you'll find us, the purple and yellow balloons are getting expensive and the lady in the balloon store is starting to look at me funny. I'll come up with something and post it as we get closer. Check it out here, though they do not have it updated. http://www.jazzhaven....

Questions? Complaints? Lost? Ideas? Call me at 802 233-9060

Tom
item.how_to_find_us: Not sure how you'll find us - check back as we get closer - I'll think of something.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Jazz on the Green
